subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Jeff Garcia has led the Buccaneers from worst to first in the N.F.C. South, a turnaround similar to what he engineered last season with the Eagles.
snippet: Quarterback Jeff Garcia has led the Buccaneers from worst to first in the N.F.C. South, a turnaround similar to what he engineered last season with the Eagles.
